institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 29 (Implementation of Vocational Training for Contracting Companies)
contents: Article 29 (Implementation of vocational training for contracting companies) ① The joint training center must provide appropriate education and training, such as improvement training and training for prospective employees, according to the training needs of contracting companies. ② Deleted March 26, 2019 ③ If a joint training center conducts training in accordance with Article 19, Paragraph 3, Item 6 of the Regulations, it must meet the requirements of Article 19, Paragraph 2, Appendix 2 of the 「National Tomorrow Learning Card Operation Regulations」. Revised on April 25, 2023, ④ The joint training center provides vocational training for current workers of contracting companies through group training, distance training, and mixed training pursuant to each subparagraph of Article 3 (2) of the Enforcement Decree of the National Lifelong Vocational Skills Development Act. It can be carried out in this way. Revised on June 28, 2022, ⑤ If there is a demand, the joint training center may conduct training by moving to a location other than the facilities of the joint training center, such as the business site of a contracting company. ⑥ The joint training center may operate the following projects in parallel to the extent that they do not interfere with the consortium business. Revised on June 28, 2022, 1. Training for national key and strategic industries in accordance with Article 15 of the 「National Lifelong Vocational Competency Development Act」 2. Vocational competency development account system in accordance with Article 18 of the 「National Lifelong Vocational Competency Development Act」
